name: Deloitte GmbH Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft
goal: Deloitte Germany provides audit, risk advisory, tax, consulting and financial advisory services to public and private clients spanning multiple industries; legal advisory services in Germany are provided by Deloitte Legal.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade
